name: MR. TOBIAS PETER NOSKWITH
description: Personal desire to halt the proposed cession of the British Indian Ocean Territory.
sampleDescriptions: To lobby for the Government of the United States to exercise a veto, and to otherwise oppose, the cession of the British Indian Ocean Territory in part or in whole to the Republic of Mauritius. In add
